程序包 com.teamone.unitask.tasks

接口 TaskRepository

所有超级接口:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Task,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Task,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Task,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Task>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Task,Long>
@Repository public interface TaskRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Task,Long>
The repository class for the Task entity

  • 方法详细资料

    • getByTaskId

      Task getByTaskId(Long taskId)
      Retrieves a task by its ID.
      参数:
      taskId - The ID of the task.
      返回:
      The task with the given ID.

    • findByProjectBelonged

      List<Task> findByProjectBelonged(Project project)
      Retrieves a list of tasks that belong to the specified project.
      参数:
      project - The project to which the tasks belong.
      返回:
      A list of tasks in the specified project.

    • findByParentTaskId

      List<Task> findByParentTaskId(Long parentTaskId)
      Retrieves a list of tasks that have the specified task as their parent.
      参数:
      parentTaskId - The ID of the parent task.
      返回:
      A list of tasks that are children of the specified parent task.

    • existsByTaskId

      boolean existsByTaskId(Long id)
      Checks if a task with the specified ID exists.
      参数:
      id - The ID of the task.
      返回:
      True if a task with the specified ID exists, false otherwise.

    • findTasksByTaskMemberAssignedAndProjectBelonged

      List<Task> findTasksByTaskMemberAssignedAndProjectBelonged(User memberAssigned, Project projectBelonged)
      Retrieves a list of tasks assigned to a specific user in a given project.
      参数:
      memberAssigned - The user to whom the tasks are assigned.
      projectBelonged - The project to which the tasks belong.
      返回:
      A list of tasks assigned to the specified user in the specified project.
